TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OperationAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the list of possible actions when the parent `End` of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipType"> is deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.OperationAction Cascade = int32(1)

Docs.summary: When a parent `End` is deleted, its associated child ends are deleted as well.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.OperationAction None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Only a parent `End` can be deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.OperationAction Restrict = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A parent `End` cannot be deleted if it has one or more associated child ends.
